citations.desc: Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors).
citations.narrative:
A written Program of Veterinary Care (PVC) was not available for inspection. In order to comply with this section of the
Animal Welfare Act (AWA) a written PVC must always be in place and available for inspection. Under formal
arrangements, as directed by the AWA, the establishment must have an updated PVC by the current Attending
Veterinarian (AV). To ensure adequate veterinary medical care to regulated animals, a complete written PVC must be
readily available for inspection. Also, the contracted AV must schedule and regularly visit the establishment's premises.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.40(a)(1) 
   
Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors). 
A written Program of Veterinary Care (PVC) was not available for inspection. In order to comply with this section of the 
Animal Welfare Act (AWA) a written PVC must always be in place and available for inspection. Under formal 
arrangements, as directed by the AWA, the establishment must have an updated PVC by the current Attending 
Veterinarian (AV). To ensure adequate veterinary medical care to regulated animals, a complete written PVC must be 
readily available for inspection. Also, the contracted AV must schedule and regularly visit the establishment's premises. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative. 
 
 n
